name: Superawesome
description:
We are a small, multifaceted team operating from Novi Sad, Serbia (CET). We are working with customers from all over the world.
Since 2007 we’ve helped tons of customers launch their products and companies. They sometimes came to us with only an idea that needed to be developed further into a product, an existing project in need of a facelift, and sometimes even a complete rethinking.
We specialize in user interface design, including front-end development which we we consider to be an integral part of the overall user experience we produce as a result of our design process.
Considering the years of accummulated experience our team has gathered through various projects in different industries, we consider our services to be extremely affordable.
USER EXPERIENCE & INTERFACE DESIGN 
Platform agnostic, or platform specific, it’s not just about looking fresh. All software should be enjoyable, as well as usable.
PRODUCT DESIGN 
Shaping ideas into useful products, and designing features that benefit your users, and bring ROI.
FRONT-END DEVELOPMENT 
We make use of modern technologies and workflows in order to make our UIs feel snappy, and work anywhere.
